overview:
Omon Edeki currently serves as Managing Director of Nowell Software, a cloud saas security software company.

Edeki Co-founded Nowell Software in 2003 and was the architect of the company’s artificial intelligence and anomaly detection risk security software algorithms. Edeki is well experienced in software engineering, business development, and information security. Mr. Edeki, who holds a US patent in computer security, studied Computer Sciences at the University of Texas at Austin. Omon Edeki attributes all his success and enterprise to his faith in the Lord Jesus Christ
